user_question: What are the top 5 highest individual scores in Test cricket and generate an image of a cricket stadium?
final_answer: The top 5 highest individual scores in Test cricket are: 1) Brian Lara - 400*, 2) Matthew Hayden - 380, 3) Brian Lara - 375, 4) Mahela Jayawardene - 374, 5) Garry Sobers - 365*. Image of a cricket stadium generated. Brian Lara scored 400* at the Antigua Recreation Ground.
